foreverforest.body: Thank you for joining us in helping Forever Forest — a foundation dedicated to planting biodiverse forests in protected areas. How much of your referral reward you like to contribute?
foreverforest.caption: TYLKO × FOREVER FOREST
foreverforest.label: Your email (the same you used for purchase)
foreverforest.large_donation: Thanks to you, throughout Autumn 2022 the foundation will be able to plant as much as 100m2 of forest.
foreverforest.meta_title: Tylko – Plant a forest with us
foreverforest.no_donation: If you prefer not to donate your reward, please close this window
foreverforest.small_donation: Thanks to your contribution,  in Autumn 2022 we'll be able to plant as much as 50m2 of forest. The remaining half of your reward will be sent to you.
foreverforest.thanks: On behalf of mother earth, we'd like to  thank you for donating your reward to the Forever Forest Foundation.
foreverforest.title: Plant a forest with us
